attributes.action: Ditch the proposal for a new £60m royal yacht
attributes.additional_details:
We are constantly bombarded day in, day out with grim news of our economic woes, and how "we're all in it together".  Members of our government believe the nation's resources are best served by commissioning a £60 million boat, for a woman who quite frankly has enough money as it is already.

Sign this petition to lodge your disgust at this TOTAL LUNACY.
